issue.title: where is roscore running in cloudsim?

content.raw:
The simulator runs the roscore that the field computer will connect to in order to sent controller commands and listen to sensor updates.

You can also run a roscore on a different port on the field computer if you want. This is the "multi-master" approach described here:

* http://wiki.ros.org/sig/Multimaster/Existing%20Techniques

I just updated the example so that it starts an http server on port 8000 and a roscore on port 8001:

* https://github.com/scpeters/src_field_computer_test/commit/f50bec080558368f1008af4e8d951e7e20fc6211
